m_szDocTitle: Tesla unveils its $35,000 Model 3 for the masses
m_szDocSumamry: Tesla unveils its $35,000 Model 3 for the masses 3,200 shares At an event in Los Angeles, Tesla today unveiled its latest electric car, the Model 3 . The $35,000 vehicle is designed to seat five adults comfortably and can travel 215 miles on a single charge. It goes from 0-60mph in six seconds. Our best speaker lineup, ever. This year’s edition of TNW Conference in Amsterdam includes some          of the biggest names in tech.
